org.eclipse.eef.core.internal.controllers

Class EEFListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.eef.core.api.controllers.AbstractEEFController
      • org.eclipse.eef.core.api.controllers.AbstractEEFWidgetController
        • org.eclipse.eef.core.api.controllers.AbstractEEFOnClickController
          • org.eclipse.eef.core.internal.controllers.EEFListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEEFController, IEEFListController, IEEFOnClickController, IEEFWidgetController

    public class EEFListController
extends AbstractEEFOnClickController
implements IEEFListController
    This class will be used in order to manage the behavior of the list widget.
